Articles.Content:
So recently Minecraft, and a few other games I play have allowed you to change your username, I personally would enjoy this feature on the forums, like, every 30 days or so after you've changed yer username you're allowed to again, and you are required to post a thread saying your old name, we could even have a subforum just for it so other places dont get spammed up with stuff like that.

Just an idea, don't hate me for it.
You can already change it. It's just a one time thing.
![:o](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_ohmy.png) where would i find this option?

Contact one of the moderators. Most of them (if not all of them) can do it for you.

But keep in mind as Robotengineer this is a one time deal. The ability to change usernames freely is a BAD idea. With everybody changing names there is no way to keep track of who's who.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-04T20:54:53Z" title="07/04/2015 08:54  PM" data-short="9 yr">July 4, 2015</time> by Tex\_NL**

> 
> Contact one of the moderators. Most of them (if not all of them) can do it for you.
> But keep in mind as Robotengineer this is a one time deal. The ability to change usernames freely is a BAD idea. With everybody changing names there is no way to keep track of who's who.

Danke!

I kinda suggested a way to tell whos who tho

Yes, you can request a one time name change. One way to do that is in [this thread](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/122939-The-Name-Change-Thread-%28WARNING%21-ONE-TIME-ONLY%21%29). Alternatively, you can PM one of the moderators and we'll pass the request along as needed.

Also, moved to the Kerbal Network and closed.
